page.title: 04CHARITABLE GROUPS.
page.content: The only charity that has been set up in this area is the Higher Line Handicapped Children's Trust.This is run by Stonyhurst College,and is not well known. The 'Higher Line' is the top two years in the College,namely the Sixth Formers.Many things take place during the year to raise money to provide a holiday for many handicapped children. Things like the selling of the College Christmas cards,fairs,jumble sales and,just recently,the addition of the Rudiments' Garden Party (Rudiments is the top year in the Preparatory School). The Sixth Formers organise the holiday,with the aid of some adult trustees,and this holiday takes place the week after school has broken up.
